window.atrUser = $.cookie('atrUser') && $.cookie('atrUser').length ? true : false;
window.seleniumUser = $.cookie('atrUser') && $.cookie('atrUser').length ? true : false;
    

//SEPARATOR
var testyAB = [ 
    {"testName": 'ab_dev_search4', 'versions':'A,B'}
]

function shouldRunTests(){
	var VarShouldRunTest = [];
    $.each(testyAB, function(i) {
        if(testyAB[i].versions.indexOf(test.getVar(testyAB[i].testName))>-1){
            VarShouldRunTest.push(false);
         }else{
            VarShouldRunTest.push(true);
        }
    })
	return VarShouldRunTest.toString().indexOf('false')<=-1
}
  
//________________________TEST AB WYSZUKIWARKI_______________________
var cookieExist_search;
var search_testAB4 = {
  testABSelection: function() {
    search_ab = new _AB_({
      name: 'ab_dev_search4',
      wariant: {
        'A': {
          'weight': 50,
          Event: function(e) {
            search_testAB4.sendEvent('A','ab_dev_search4_p');
            test.setVar('ab_dev_search', 'A') 
            UA.interaction('Wyszukiwarka', 'Input', 'Klikniecie');
          }
        },
        'B': {
          'weight': 50,
          Event: function(e) {
            app.enableDevelopSearchMode()
            search_testAB4.sendEvent('B','ab_dev_search4_p');
            test.setVar('ab_dev_search', 'B') 
            UA.interaction('Wyszukiwarka', 'Input', 'Klikniecie');
          }
        },
        'V': {
          'weight': 0,
          Event: function(e) {
            search_testAB4.sendEvent('V','ab_dev_search4_p');
            test.setVar('ab_dev_search', 'V') 
            UA.interaction('Wyszukiwarka', 'Input', 'Klikniecie');
          }
        }
      }
    });
  },
  sendEvent: function(version,testName){
    if(cookieExist_search == false && document.referrer.indexOf('euro') <= -1){
        dataLayer.push({
            'event': 'TestAB',
            'testAB_category': 'TestAB',
            'testAB_name': testName,
            'testAB_variant': version
        })
    }
  },
  initAB: function() {
  	if (typeof _AB_ !== "undefined" ){
        search_testAB4.testABSelection();
    }
    else{
        UA.interaction('TestAB', 'ab_dev_search_p', 'nieudane wywolanie funkcji losujacej');
    }
  },
  init: function() {
    if(atrUser != true && shouldRunTests()){
       search_testAB4.initAB();
    }
  }
}

$(document).ready(function(){
    var testAbControlInt = 0;

    if(test.getVar('ab_dev_search4') === null && test.getVar('ab_dev_search') != null){
      UA.interaction('TestAB', 'Usuniecie Usera z testu AB ab_dev_search_p', 'User byl w wersji '+ test.getVar('ab_dev_search'));
      test.delVar('ab_dev_search')
    }

    if(test.getVar('ab_dev_search4') != null){
        cookieExist_search = true;
    }else{
        cookieExist_search = false;
    }

    $('#search-box #keyword').on('click',function(){
        if(!testAbControlInt>0){
          testAbControlInt += 1;
          search_testAB4.init();
        }
    });
})

<script>


    function asyncFunc (fn) {
        setTimeout(fn, 20);
    }

    function executeWhen (test, doThen) {
        asyncFunc(function () {
            if ( test() ) {
                doThen();
            } else {
                asyncFunc(arguments.callee);
            }
        });
    }

    function getVisitId(){
       	var x = $.cookie('euroVisit') || "adblock";
        if ( typeof $.cookie('euroVisit') !== 'undefined' ){
            $.cookie('euroVisit').indexOf('::') != -1 ? x=x.split('::') : x=x.split("|");
        }
     	if(x.length>1){
      		return x[0];
     	}
     	else{
      		return x[0];
     	}
    }

    function getCustomerId() {
     	var x = $.cookie('euroCustomer') || "adblock";
      
      	if (typeof $.cookie('euroCustomer') !== 'undefined' ){
           $.cookie('euroCustomer').indexOf('::') != -1 ? x = x.substring(0,x.indexOf('::')) : x = x.substring(0,x.indexOf('|'));
        }
      
     	if(x.length>1){
      		return x;
     	}
     	else{
      		return "0";
     	}
    }
  
  	var __plu;

    function plu() {
       if (typeof __plu=='undefined' || !__plu){
                  __plu = jQuery('.PLU').length == 1 ? (jQuery('.PLU').html()-0) : '';
       }
       return __plu;

    }

    var __visit_id;

    function visit_id() {  //mamy taka sama funkcje w log.js
       if (typeof __visit_id=='undefined' || !__visit_id){
                  var x = $.cookie('euroVisit')|| "adblock";
                  if ( typeof $.cookie('euroVisit') !== 'undefined' ){
                      $.cookie('euroVisit').indexOf('::') != -1 ? x = x.substring(0,x.indexOf('::')) : x = x.substring(0,x.indexOf('|'));
                  }
                  __visit_id = x;
       }
       return __visit_id;
    }

    function getFrontUserId(){
                try{
                    var fuid;
                    if ( typeof $.cookie('euroVisit') !== 'undefined' ){
                        $.cookie('euroVisit').indexOf('::') != -1 ? fuid = jQuery.cookie('euroVisit').split('::') : fuid = jQuery.cookie('euroVisit').split('|');
                    }        
                    return fuid[fuid.length - 5];  

                }catch(e){}
                return '';
    }

    var __customer_id;

    function customer_id() { 

       if (typeof __customer_id=='undefined' || !__customer_id) {
                  var x = $.cookie('euroCustomer') || "adblock";
         		  if ( typeof $.cookie('euroCustomer') !== 'undefined' ){
                      $.cookie('euroCustomer').indexOf('::') != -1 ? x = x.substring(0,x.indexOf('::')) : x = x.substring(0,x.indexOf('|'));
                  }
                  __customer_id = x;
       }
       return __customer_id;

    }

t=e.target&&e.target.ownerDocument||document,n=t.documentElement,o=t.body,c=e.clientX+(n&&n.scrollLeft||o&&o.scrollLeft||0)-(n&&n.clientLeft||o&&o.clientLeft||0)+","+(e.clientY+(n&&n.scrollTop||o&&o.scrollTop||0)-(n&&n.clientTop||o&&o.clientTop||0))+"; ",r={t:a(),m:c};wf_trafficscanner_obj.websocket.send(JSON.stringify(r))}),document.addEventListener("touchmove",function(e){if(e.targetTouches&&1===e.targetTouches.length){var t=e.targetTouches[0],n=t.target&&t.target.ownerDocument||document,o=n.documentElement,c=n.body,r=t.clientX+(o&&o.scrollLeft||c&&c.scrollLeft||0)-(o&&o.clientLeft||c&&c.clientLeft||0),s=null,i=(o&&o.scrollTop||c&&c.scrollTop||0)-(o&&o.clientTop||c&&c.clientTop||0);s=null!=h.scrollTop?t.clientY+(h.scrollTop-i):t.clientY+i;var l=Math.round(r)+","+Math.round(s)+"; ",u={t:a(),m:l};wf_trafficscanner_obj.websocket.send(JSON.stringify(u))}}),document.addEventListener("touchstart",function(e){if(e.targetTouches&&1===e.targetTouches.length){var t=e.targetTouches[0],n=t.target&&t.target.ownerDocument||document,o=n.documentElement,c=n.body,r=(o&&o.scrollTop||c&&c.scrollTop||0)-(o&&o.clientTop||c&&c.clientTop||0),s=t.clientX+(o&&o.scrollLeft||c&&c.scrollLeft||0)-(o&&o.clientLeft||c&&c.clientLeft||0),i=t.clientY+r;h.x=s,h.y=i,h.scrollTop=r}}),document.addEventListener("touchend",function(e){e.changedTouches&&1===e.changedTouches.length&&(h.x=null,h.y=null,h.scrollTop=null)});document.addEventListener("scroll",function(e){var t=void 0!==window.pageYOffset?window.pageYOffset:(document.documentElement||document.body.parentNode||document.body).scrollTop,n={t:a(),s:t};wf_trafficscanner_obj.websocket.send(JSON.stringify(n))})}}()}catch(e){console.log(e)}
</script>

<a href="/konto.bhtml?link=mainnaviB&amp;main_cat_menu=Strefa_Klienta_Strefa_Klienta" class="head-name">Strefa Klienta</a>
<a href="/artykuly.bhtml?link=mainnaviB&amp;main_cat_menu=Strefa_Klienta_strefa_klienta" class="outlet"> <span class="image-icon">

<script>
(function ($) {
var czysty_url = "/laptopy-i-netbooki.bhtml";
  function add_act_class(url, name) {
    if (url.indexOf(name) > -1) {
      $(".table-cell[data-box='" + name + "']").addClass("active");
      console.log("czysty");
      $(".table-cell[data-box='" + name + "']").attr("href", czysty_url);
    }
  }

  function checkUrl() {
    var url = location.href;
    var cat_arr = ["wybierzlap1", "wybierzlap2", "wybierzlap3", "wybierzlap4", "wybierzlap5"];
    $(".table-cell").removeClass("active");
    for (i = 0; i < cat_arr.length; i++) {
      add_act_class(url, cat_arr[i])
    }
  }
  checkUrl();
  
})(jQuery);
</script></div>

<h2 class="product-name">
				<a class="js-save-keyword" href="/laptopy-i-netbooki/asus-laptop-gu603-16-i7-16g-1tbssd-3050ti-w10.bhtml">

  <li>Kod może być też wykorzystany przy zamówieniach telefonicznych dzwoniąc pod numer 855 855 855 (opłata według taryfy operatora) oraz w sklepach fizycznych RTV EURO AGD w godzinach ich funkcjonowania i w czasie obowiązywania kodu.</li>
  <li>Kod nie łączy się z innymi kodami rabatowymi. W ramach jednej transakcji można użyć tylko jednego kodu rabatowego.</li>
  <li>Podczas jednego Zamówienia/Rezerwacji/Zakupu w Sklepie fizycznym możliwe jest wykorzystanie kodu tylko na 1 sztukę tego samego produktu.</li>
  <li>Kod rabatowy GOODDEAL290722 obowiązuje w dniu 29.07.2022 od godz. 00:00 do godz. 23:45 lub do wyczerpania liczby dostępnych sztuk produktów.</li>
</ul></div>

			<style>
.weeks-product-container{position:relative;z-index:2;top:10px}
.hero-label{color:#000;background-color:#ffcc02;padding:6px 7px 7px 35px;font-size:16px;font-weight:700;display:inline-block;top:0;left:0;z-index:4;position:absolute;text-transform:uppercase}
.hero-label::before{content:"";position:absolute;background-image:url(//f00.esfr.pl/si_upload/gfx/2020/02_20_iem/cup.png);width:20px;height:20px;left:8px;top:6px}

<script>
  $(function() {

    
     var dealsPlu = {
 "125":""
    };   
    

    
    var html = '<div class="weeks-product-container"><div class="hero-label">Produkt tygodnia</div></div>';

    function promoPrices(elem) {
      var promoMark;
      elem.each(function(v, o) {
        var $o = $(o),
            plu = $o.find("input.productPlu").val(),
            discount = $o.find(".lower-price"),
            status = $o.find(".product-status"),
            header = $o.find(".product-header");
        if (dealsPlu.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
          $o.removeClass("product-top-list");
          status.css("display","none");
          if (!$o.find(".weeks-product-container").length) {
            header.after(html);
          }
        }
      })
    }
    
    function promoPricesNewKP() {
      var promoMark,
          $o = $("#product-top"),
          plu = _PRODUCT.plu,
          status = $o.find(".product-status"),
          header = $o.find(".product-header");
      if (dealsPlu.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
        console.log("prodtyg");
          $o.removeClass("product-top-list");
          status.css("display","none");
          if (!$o.find(".weeks-product-container").length) {
            header.after(html);
          }
        }
    }

    function insertElement() {
      var elements;
      if (app.pageType() == "leaf") {
        elements = $(".product-box","#products");
        promoPrices(elements);
      } else if (app.pageType() == "product-card") {
        elements = $("#product-card");
        promoPrices(elements);
      } else if (app.pageType() == "product-detail") {
        promoPricesNewKP();
      }
    }
    insertElement();
    
    $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
      if (settings.url.indexOf(location.pathname.split(",")[0]) !== -1) {
        insertElement();
      }
    });  
  })
</script></div>

$(function () {
  var categoryName = $("#breadcrumb").find("li:last").text().trim();
  $("#filtracja").on("click", "a", function (e) {
      var label = categoryName + " - " + $(this).text().trim() + " - Redirect";
      UA.pageInteraction("Szybkie filtry", label);
    }).on("mouseenter", ".help-icon", function () {
      var label = categoryName + " - " + $(this).parent().text().trim() + " - Info";
      UA.pageInteraction("Szybkie filtry", label);
    })
    .find("div.items").on("click", function (e) {
      var label = categoryName + " - " + $(e.target).parent().find(">span").text().trim() + " - Rozwiń";
      if ($(e.target).parent().is(".items")) UA.pageInteraction("Szybkie filtry", label);
    })
  $("#wyb_filtry, #mof").on("click", "a", function(e){
      var label = categoryName + " - " + $(this).text().trim() + " - Redirect";

    });

});

<script>

$(document).ready(function () {
	if(window.atrUser == true){
		
	}else{
		
	var laptopAdModalF =  function(){
		var laptopAdModal = "\n<div class=\"laptop-ad\">\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-modal-top\">\n<p>Szukasz laptopa? Porozmawiaj z ekspertem.</p>\n</div>\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-modal-center\">\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-modal-box\">\n<div class=\"title-box\">\nROZMOWA Z EKSPERTEM\n</div>\n<ul>\n<li><span class=\"icon-check icon\"></span>ustalimy, czego potrzebujesz</li>\n<li><span class=\"icon-check icon\"></span>wybierzemy dla Ciebie najlepszego laptopa</li>\n<li><span class=\"icon-check icon\"></span>odpowiemy na wszelkie pytania</li>\n<li><span class=\"icon-check icon\"></span>kupisz laptopa bezpiecznie, bez wychodzenia z domu</li>\n</ul>\n<a href=\"tel:855 855 899\" class=\"btn btn-primary btn-przejdz laptop-ad-modal-btn\"><span>Zadzwoń na:</span> <strong>855 855 899</strong></a>\n<p class=\"laptop-ad-modal-hours\"><strong>Godziny pracy infolinii:</strong></p>\n<p class=\"laptop-ad-modal-hours\">Poniedziałek - piątek: 9:00 - 19:00</p>\n<hr>\n<p class=\"ad-info\">Koszt połączenia według taryfy lokalnej Twojego operatora.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>";
	
	
		var options = {
		  id: "laptop-ad-modal",
		  content: laptopAdModal
		};	
	
		openLpFancybox(options);
	
	  };	
	
	
		function openLpFancybox(options){
			if(typeof options == "undefined" || typeof options != "object") return false;
			app.showModal(options);
		}
		
		// widget init 
		
		var laptopAdModalWidget = "\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-tooltip-container\">\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-tooltip laptop-ad-hidden\">\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-help-load laptop-ad-hidden\">\n<div class=\"dott\"></div>\n<div class=\"dott\"></div>\n<div class=\"dott\"></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-help-text laptop-ad-hidden\">\n<div class=\"close-laptop-ad-tooltip\"></div>\t\t          \n<span><small>Ekspert ds. laptopów 855 855 899</small></span>\n<span>Szukasz laptopa?<br>Chętnie doradzę.</span>\n</div>\n</div>\n\n<button id=\"laptop-ad-button\">\n<div class=\"ad-laptop-face\"></div>\n<div class=\"laptop-ad-dott\"></div>\n</button>\n</div>\t\t\n";
		
		var initLaptopAd = function(){
			$(laptopAdModalWidget).appendTo('#main-footer'); 
			
			setTimeout(function() {
				$('.laptop-ad-help-load, .laptop-ad-tooltip').removeClass('laptop-ad-hidden');
			}, 5000);
			
			setTimeout(function() {
				$('.laptop-ad-help-text').removeClass('laptop-ad-hidden');
				$('.laptop-ad-help-load').addClass('laptop-ad-hidden');
			}, 10000);		
			
			$('.laptop-ad-tooltip span, #laptop-ad-button').on('click', function(){
				laptopAdModalF();
			});
			
			$('.laptop-ad-tooltip .close-laptop-ad-tooltip').on('click', function(){
				$('.laptop-ad-tooltip-container').fadeOut(500);
			});
			$('.laptop-ad .laptop-ad-modal-btn').on('click', function(){
				 UA.interaction("Ekspert_ds_laptopow", "button", "klikniecie");
			});          
		}
		
        setTimeout(function(){
          initLaptopAd();
        },30000);
		
	}
});
  
</script></div>

  </div>

<div class="stars-modal-blue-info">Ocena została nadana na podstawie wyników badania satysfakcji wykonanego przez Centrum Autoryzacji Szkód w okresie 01.01.2022 – 20.04.2022. Badanie obejmuje klientów, którzy wyrazili zgodę na przeprowadzenie takiego badania. Badanie satysfakcji jest przeprowadzane po naprawie, odbiorze nowego sprzętu lub środków na zakup nowego sprzętu.</div></div>`;
    
function numberWithSeparator(number) {
    return number.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, " ");
}
    
    function numbertoString(number) {
    return (Math.round(number * 100) / 100).toFixed(1);
}
    
    $(document).on("click", '.pg-rating-container.simple', function() {
      var $that = $(this);
      var cat = $that.attr("data-category")
      var option1 = $that.attr("data-option-1")
      var option2 = $that.attr("data-option-2")
      var pgCat = pgData[cat];
      var pgIcon1 = "";
      var pgIcon2 = "";
      if (option1 == "Wariant Pełny") {
        pgIcon1 = "full"
      } else if (option1 == "Wariant Podstawowy") {
        pgIcon1 = "basic"
      } else if (option1 == "Ochrona Ekranu") {
        pgIcon1 = "screen"
      }
      if (option2 == "Wariant Pełny") {
        pgIcon2 = "full"
      } else if (option2 == "Wariant Podstawowy") {
        pgIcon2 = "basic"
      } else if (option2 == "Ochrona Ekranu") {
        pgIcon2 = "screen"
      }
      if (option2 == "CCC" || option2 == "undefined" || option2 == "" || option1 == option2) {
        app.showModal({ id: "pg-stars-modal", content: modal1.replace("AAA",pgCat.name).replace("BBB",option1).replace("DDD",numberWithSeparator(pgCat[option1].quantity)).replace("FFF",numbertoString(pgCat[option1].rating)).replace("HHH",pgCat[option1].rating / 5 * 100).replace("JJJ", pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("KKK", pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("LLL", pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("MMM", pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("NNN", pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)   .replace("OOO", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("PPP", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("RRR", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("SSS", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("TTT", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("LFL",pgIcon1)});
      } else {
        app.showModal({ id: "pg-stars-modal", content: modal2.replace("AAA",pgCat.name).replace("BBB",option1).replace("CCC",option2).replace("DDD",numberWithSeparator(pgCat[option1].quantity)).replace("EEE",numberWithSeparator(pgCat[option2].quantity)).replace("FFF",numbertoString(pgCat[option1].rating)).replace("GGG",numbertoString(pgCat[option2].rating)).replace("HHH",pgCat[option1].rating / 5 * 100).replace("III",pgCat[option2].rating / 5 * 100).replace("JJJ", pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("KKK", pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("LLL", pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("MMM", pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("NNN", pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)   .replace("OOO", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("PPP", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("RRR", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("SSS", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("TTT", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("UUU", pgCat[option2].details[0] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("WWW", pgCat[option2].details[1] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("XXX", pgCat[option2].details[2] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("YYY", pgCat[option2].details[3] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("ZZZ", pgCat[option2].details[4] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)   .replace("LAL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[0] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LBL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[1] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LCL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[2] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LDL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[3] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LEL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[4] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LFL",pgIcon1).replace("LGL",pgIcon2)});
      }
    });
    
    $(document).on("click", '.pg-rating-container.complex', function() {
      var $that = $(this);
      var cat = $that.attr("data-category")
      var option1 = $that.attr("data-option-1")
      var option2 = $that.attr("data-option-2")
      var pgCat = pgData[cat];
      var pgIcon1 = "";
      var pgIcon2 = "";
      if (option1 == "Wariant Pełny") {
        pgIcon1 = "full"
      } else if (option1 == "Wariant Podstawowy") {
        pgIcon1 = "basic"
      } else if (option1 == "Ochrona Ekranu") {
        pgIcon1 = "screen"
      }
      if (option2 == "Wariant Pełny") {
        pgIcon2 = "full"
      } else if (option2 == "Wariant Podstawowy") {
        pgIcon2 = "basic"
      } else if (option2 == "Ochrona Ekranu") {
        pgIcon2 = "screen"
      }
      if (option2 == "CCC" || option2 == "undefined" || option2 == "" || option1 == option2) {
        var modalHTML = modal1.replace("AAA",pgCat.name).replace("BBB",option1).replace("DDD",numberWithSeparator(pgCat[option1].quantity)).replace("FFF",numbertoString(pgCat[option1].rating)).replace("HHH",pgCat[option1].rating / 5 * 100).replace("JJJ", pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("KKK", pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("LLL", pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("MMM", pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("NNN", pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)   .replace("OOO", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("PPP", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("RRR", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("SSS", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("TTT", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("LFL",pgIcon1);
        if ($("#warranty-encouragement-modal").find(".stars-modal-container").length) {
          $("#warranty-encouragement").hide()
          $("#warranty-encouragement-modal").find(".stars-modal-container").show()
        } else {
          $("#warranty-encouragement").hide().after(modalHTML)
        }
      } else {
        var modalHTML = modal2.replace("AAA",pgCat.name).replace("BBB",option1).replace("CCC",option2).replace("DDD",numberWithSeparator(pgCat[option1].quantity)).replace("EEE",numberWithSeparator(pgCat[option2].quantity)).replace("FFF",numbertoString(pgCat[option1].rating)).replace("GGG",numbertoString(pgCat[option2].rating)).replace("HHH",pgCat[option1].rating / 5 * 100).replace("III",pgCat[option2].rating / 5 * 100).replace("JJJ", pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("KKK", pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("LLL", pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("MMM", pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100).replace("NNN", pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)   .replace("OOO", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[0] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("PPP", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[1] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("RRR", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[2] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("SSS", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[3] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("TTT", Math.round(pgCat[option1].details[4] / pgCat[option1].quantity * 100)).replace("UUU", pgCat[option2].details[0] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("WWW", pgCat[option2].details[1] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("XXX", pgCat[option2].details[2] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("YYY", pgCat[option2].details[3] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100).replace("ZZZ", pgCat[option2].details[4] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)   .replace("LAL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[0] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LBL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[1] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LCL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[2] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LDL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[3] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LEL", Math.round(pgCat[option2].details[4] / pgCat[option2].quantity * 100)).replace("LFL",pgIcon1).replace("LGL",pgIcon2);
        if ($("#warranty-encouragement-modal").find(".stars-modal-container").length) {
          $("#warranty-encouragement").hide()
          $("#warranty-encouragement-modal").find(".stars-modal-container").show()
        } else {
          $("#warranty-encouragement").hide().after(modalHTML)
        }
      }
    });

    $(document).on("click", '.pg-remodal-close', function() {
       $("#warranty-encouragement-modal").find(".stars-modal-container").hide()
      $("#warranty-encouragement").show();
    });
    
    var productType = {}
    
    var stars = '<div class="pg-rating-container simple" data-category="AAA" data-option-1="BBB" data-option-2="CCC"><div class="pg-stars-container"><div class="pg-stars-inner" style="width:XXX%"></div></div><div class="pg-quantity-number">(YYY ocen)</div></div>'
    
    function getCode(prod) {
      return $.ajax({
        url: "/cmsPageFancy.ltr?linkName=stars-pg",
        dataType: "html",
        data: {
          plu: prod
        }
      });
    }

    function getVariantWarranty(text) {
      if (text.indexOf("Wariant Pełny") > -1) {
        return "Wariant Pełny"
      } else if (text.indexOf("Wariant Podstawowy") > -1) {
        return "Wariant Podstawowy"
      } else if (text.indexOf("Ochrona Ekranu") > -1) {
        return "Ochrona Ekranu"
      } 
    }
    
    function getVariantOccurance(fullText,text) {
        var regex = new RegExp(text, "g");
        return fullText.match(regex).length;
    }

    function appendStarsOnListingLayer(plu) {
      $.when(getCode(plu).done(function(data) {
        if(data != "") {
          var productType = $.parseJSON(data);
          if (productType.groupName == "Smartfony i telefony" || productType.groupName == "Tablety" || productType.groupName == "Nawigacja GPS") {
            productType.categoryName = "Ekran"
          }
          if (pgData.hasOwnProperty(productType.categoryName)) {
            $("#warranty-encouragement").addClass("stars");
            $("#warranty-encouragement").find(".warranty-item").each(function() {
              var $that = $(this);
              var text = $that.find(".warranty-name").clone().children().remove().end().text();
              var text2 = $that.parent().find(".warranty-item").not(this).find(".warranty-name").clone().children().remove().end().text()
              var variant = getVariantWarranty(text);
              if (!$that.find(".pg-rating-container").length > 0) {
                $that.find(".warranty-name").after(stars.replace(" simple"," complex").replace("AAA",productType.categoryName).replace("BBB",text.trim()).replace("CCC",text2.trim()).replace("XXX",pgData[productType.categoryName][variant].rating / 5 * 100).replace("YYY",numberWithSeparator(pgData[productType.categoryName][variant].quantity)))
              }
            })
          }
        }
      }));
    }

    function init(plu) {
      appendStarsOnListingLayer(plu)
    }
  
    $(".add-to-cart").click(function() {
      var plu = $(this).attr("data-plu");
      $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
        if (settings.url.indexOf("warrantyEncouragement.ltr") !== -1) {
          setTimeout(function() {
            init(plu)
          },300)
        }
      })
    })
    
  })
</script></div>

		<div data-id="76214540929-6" class="banner-item banner-html banner-text" >
			<script>
  $(function() {

    function hidePCC() {
      $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
        if (settings.url.indexOf("/refresh-shops-with-product.ltr") !== -1) {
          setTimeout(function() {
            $(".shop-item").each(function() {
              var $o = $(this),
                  name = $o.find("h3"),
                  nameText = name.text().trim(),
                  city = $o.find(".city").text().trim();
              if (nameText == "Outbound PCC") {
                $o.hide()
              }
            })
          },300);
        }
      })
    }

    if(atrUser == false) {
    hidePCC();
    }

  })
</script></div>
	<!-- banner id: 73136000793 -->
		<div data-id="73136000793-7" class="banner-item banner-html banner-text" >
			<style>
.saturday-delivery{color:#00a551;display:block;padding-left:23px;margin-top:-2px}
#product-detail .saturday-delivery{padding-left:33px}
.saturday-delivery:hover{color:#00a551}
</style>
<script>
$(function() {

  var html = '<a href="/cms/darmowy-transport.bhtml" target="_blank" class="saturday-delivery">Nowość! Dostawa w sobotę</a>';
  
  function getPageType() {
    var x = app.pageType();
    switch(x){
      case ("product-card"):
      case ("product"):
        x = "PRODUCT_CARD";
        break;
      case ("leaf"):
        x = "PRODUCT_LIST";
        break;
      case ("suite-card"):
        x = "SUITE_CARD";
        break;
      case ("product-detail"):
        x = "CROSSSELL";
        break;  
      default:
        x = app.pageType();
    }
    return x;
  }

  function saturdayDelivery(elem) {
    elem.each(function(v, o) {
      var $o = $(o),
          plu = $o.find("input.productPlu").val(),
          priceBox = $o.find(".product-sales-category.product-category-new");
      priceBox.each(function(v, o) {
        var $that = $(o);
        var item = $that.find(".home-delivery-action");
        if (item.text().indexOf("już jutro") > 0) {
          if(!$that.find(".saturday-delivery").length) {
            item.append(html);
          }
        }
      })
    })
  }
  
  function saturdayDeliveryfoOnCrossSell() {
    var item = $(".delivery-message.home-delivery");
    if (item.text().indexOf("już jutro") > 0) {
      item.append(html);
    }
  }

  function insertElement() {
    var elements;
    if (getPageType() == "PRODUCT_LIST") {
      elements = $(".product-box","#products");
      saturdayDelivery(elements);
    } else if ((getPageType() == "PRODUCT_CARD") || (getPageType() == "SUITE_CARD")) {
      elements = $("#product-card");
      saturdayDelivery(elements);
    }
  }
  
  insertElement();

  $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
    if (settings.url.indexOf(location.pathname.split(",")[0]) !== -1) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        insertElement();
     },500)
    }
  });  
  $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
    if (settings.url.indexOf("selling-section") !== -1) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        saturdayDeliveryfoOnCrossSell();
     },500)
    }
  });  
});
</script></div>

<script>
$(function() {

  $(document).on("click", ".rrso-link", function() {
    var variant = $(this).attr("data-variant");
    app.showModal({ 
      id: "installment-info",
      modifier: "remodal-full-width", 
      content: eval(variant)
    });
  })
  
  function getPageType() {
    var x = app.pageType();
    switch(x){
      case ("leaf"):
        x = "PRODUCT_LIST";
        break;
      case ("product-detail"):
        x = "CROSSSELL";
        break;  
      default:
        x = app.pageType();
    }
    return x;
  }

  function returnParsedPrice(price) {
    if (price) return parseFloat(price.replace(/[^0-9,.]/g, '').replace(',', '.'));
    else return 0;
  }

  function returnFormattedPrice(x) {
    if (x) return x.toFixed(2).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, " ").replace('.', ',').replace(",00","");
    else return false;
  }

  function countPromoInstalment(price, instalment) {
    var priceInstalment = Math.round((price / instalment)*100)/100;
    if (price <= 23000) {
      return priceInstalment;
    } else {
      return false;
    }
  }

  function collapseRules(plu) {
    $(document).on("click", '#product-list .promo-instalment-box:not(.shop-only):not(.paypo), #product-detail .is-active.promo-installment:not(.price-instalment-only-shop-tab) .promo-instalment-box:not(.paypo)', function() {
      var modal = $(this).attr("data-modal");
      app.showModal({ id: "promo-info", content: eval(modal)});
    });
    $(document).on("click", '#product-list .promo-instalment-box.paypo .paypo-link', function() {
      var cat = $(this).attr("data-category");
      dataLayer.push({
        'eventCategory': 'PayPo',
        'eventAction': 'Listing – Szczegóły',
        'eventLabel': cat,
        'eventNonInteraction': 'false',
        'event': 'visitorInteraction'
      });
    });
    $(document).on("click", '#product-detail .promo-instalment-box.paypo .paypo-link', function() {
      var cat = $(this).attr("data-category");
      dataLayer.push({
        'eventCategory': 'PayPo',
        'eventAction': 'KP – Szczegóły',
        'eventLabel': cat,
        'eventNonInteraction': 'false',
        'event': 'visitorInteraction'
      });
    });
  }

  function promoPrices(elem) {
    elem.each(function(v, o) {
      var $o = $(o),
          plu = $o.find("input.productPlu").val(),
          pluFirst = plu.slice(0,1),
          priceBox = $o.find(".product-sales-category"),
          cat = $o.find("input.subsubcat").length > 0 ? $o.find("input.subsubcat").val() : $o.find("input.subcat").val();
      priceBox.each(function(v, o) {
        var $that = $(o),
            installmentElem = $that.find(".price-instalments:first"),
            priceContainer = $that.find(".product-price"),
            voucher = $that.find(".price-voucher"),
            voucherEnd = $that.find(".price-voucher-end"),
            productPrice = returnParsedPrice(priceContainer.find(".price-normal:first").text());
        if(installmentElem.length > 0 && !$that.find(".promo-instalment-box").length > 0 && productPrice >= 300) {
          var installmentText = installmentElem.text().trim();
           if (halfYear.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
            priceContainer.append(promoBox1A);
           } else if (gratisList1.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
            var instalmentNumber = 20,
                boxPrice = returnFormattedPrice(productPrice - (countPromoInstalment(productPrice,instalmentNumber) * 1));
            priceContainer.append(promoBoxB1.replace("XXX",boxPrice));
           } else if (gratisList1b.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
            var instalmentNumber = 20,
                boxPrice = returnFormattedPrice(productPrice - (countPromoInstalment(productPrice,instalmentNumber) * 1));
            priceContainer.append(promoBoxB1b.replace("XXX",boxPrice));
           } else if (gratisList1c.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
            var instalmentNumber = 20,
                boxPrice = returnFormattedPrice(productPrice - (countPromoInstalment(productPrice,instalmentNumber) * 1));
            priceContainer.append(promoBoxB1c.replace("XXX",boxPrice));
           } else if (installmentText.indexOf("50 rat") > 0) {
             var installment = $that.find(".price-instalments-box");
             if(!installment.find(".rrso-link").length) {
               installment.append(rrso1)
             }
           } else if (installmentText.indexOf("60 rat") > 0) {
             var installment = $that.find(".price-instalments-box");
             if(!installment.find(".rrso-link").length) {
               installment.append(rrso4)
             }
           } else if (installmentText.indexOf("48 rat") > 0) {
             var installment = $that.find(".price-instalments-box");
             if(!installment.find(".rrso-link").length) {
               installment.append(rrso2)
             }
           } 
          else if (installmentText.indexOf("50 rat") > 0 || installmentText.indexOf("36 rat") > 0) {
             var installment = $that.find(".price-instalments-box");
             if(!installment.find(".rrso-link").length) {
               installment.append(rrso4)
             }
           } 
          
           else if (installmentText.indexOf("10 rat 0%") > 0) {
            priceContainer.append(promoBox1);
           } else if (installmentText.indexOf("20 rat 0%") > 0) {
             priceContainer.append(promoBox2);
           } else if (installmentText.indexOf("30 rat 0%") > 0) {
             priceContainer.append(promoBox3);
          }
        } /*else if (!installmentElem.length > 0 && !priceBox.find(".label-homeDelivery").length > 0 && !$that.find(".promo-instalment-box").length > 0 && pluFirst != "6" && productPrice < 300) {
          priceContainer.append(promoBoxPayPo.replace("YYY",cat));
        }*/
        if (installmentElem.hasClass("price-instalments-only-shop")) {
          priceContainer.find(".promo-instalment-box").addClass("shop-only")
        }
      })
    })
  }

  var selectedPromo = "default";
  $(document).on('closing', '#installments', function (e) {
    var activePromo = parseFloat($("#installments.remodal").attr("class").split('show-tab-')[1]);
    var activeTab = $("#installments.remodal").find(".tab[data-instalment='"+activePromo+"'] .warranty-instalment-name").text().trim();
    if (activeTab == "2 raty gratis 30 x0% odroczone 5 m-cy") {
      selectedPromo = "2grOdr5m";
    } else if (activeTab == "2 raty gratis 30x0% odroczone 3 m-ce") {
      selectedPromo = "2grOdr3m";
    } else if (activeTab == "1 rata gratis 20x0%") {
      selectedPromo = "1gr";
    } else if (activeTab == "2 raty gratis 30x0%") {
      selectedPromo = "2gr";
    } else if (activeTab == "3 raty gratis 30x0%") {
      selectedPromo = "3gr";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("10x0%") > 0) {
      selectedPromo = "odroczone10";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("20x0% odroczone") > 0) {
      selectedPromo = "odroczone20";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("30x0% odroczone") > 0) {
      selectedPromo = "odroczone30";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("Małe Raty") >= 0) {
      selectedPromo = "male";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("Dobre Raty") >= 0) {
      selectedPromo = "dobre";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("Raty 0,4%") >= 0) {
      selectedPromo = "raty04";
    } else if (activeTab.indexOf("Raty 0,3%") >= 0) {
      selectedPromo = "raty03";
    } else {
      selectedPromo = "";
    }
  });
  
  
  
  var pgInstallmentA1 = '<div class="pg-installment-container"><span class="pg-installment-percent">%</span> <span class="pg-installment-title">2 raty gratis</span><span class="pg-installment-info">i</span><div class="pg-installment-add-info">Dwie raty gratis za ochronę sprzętu dostępna tylko dla promocji ratalnej - "Dwie raty gratis i pół roku nie płacisz!"</div></div>';
  var pgInstallmentA2 = '<div class="pg-installment-container"><span class="pg-installment-percent">%</span> <span class="pg-installment-title">2 raty gratis</span><span class="pg-installment-info">i</span><div class="pg-installment-add-info">Dwie raty gratis za ochronę sprzętu dostępna tylko dla promocji ratalnej - "2 raty gratis z odroczeniem spłaty!"</div></div>';
  var pgInstallmentA3 = '<div class="pg-installment-container"><span class="pg-installment-percent">%</span> <span class="pg-installment-title">2 raty gratis</span><span class="pg-installment-info">i</span><div class="pg-installment-add-info">Dwie raty gratis za ochronę sprzętu dostępna tylko dla promocji ratalnej - "Dwie raty gratis!"</div></div>';
  
  function insertInstallmentToPG(promo) {
    $(".product-upselling.instalment").find(".warranty-box").each(function() {
      var $that = $(this);
      if (!$that.find(".pg-installment-container").length > 0) {
        if (promo == "A1") {
          $that.find(".warranty-price").after(pgInstallmentA1);
        } else if (promo == "A2") {
          $that.find(".warranty-price").after(pgInstallmentA2);
        } else if (promo == "A3") {
          $that.find(".warranty-price").after(pgInstallmentA3);
        }
      }
    });
  }

function changeLabel() {
  $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
    if (settings.url.indexOf("product-card-instalment") !== -1) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        $(".tab[data-code='10x0%odr6M'] .warranty-instalment-label span").text("6 miesięcy wakacji od płacenia")
      },500)
    }
  })
}
  
  function installmentInfoOnCrossSell() {
    var plu = _PRODUCT.plu;  
    var pluFirst = plu.slice(0,1);
    var installmentTab = $(".price-tab.price-instalment-tab");
    var installmentText = installmentTab.find(".instalment-message-label").text();
    var instalmentNumber = parseFloat(installmentText.split("x").pop());
    var productPrice = returnParsedPrice($(".price-tab[data-context='standard']").find(".product-price").text());
    var cat = _PRODUCT.groupName;
    if(installmentTab.length > 0 && !installmentTab.find(".promo-instalment-box").length > 0  && productPrice >= 300) {
      if (halfYear.hasOwnProperty(plu) && (selectedPromo == "odroczone10" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 10))) {
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        installmentTab.append(promoBox1A);
        changeLabel()
      } else if (gratisList1.hasOwnProperty(plu) && (selectedPromo == "1gr" || selectedPromo == "default")) {
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        var instalmentNumber = 20,
            boxPrice = returnFormattedPrice(productPrice - (countPromoInstalment(productPrice,instalmentNumber) * 1));
        installmentTab.append(promoBoxB1.replace("XXX",boxPrice));
       } else if (gratisList1b.hasOwnProperty(plu) && (selectedPromo == "1gr" || selectedPromo == "default")) {
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        var instalmentNumber = 20,
            boxPrice = returnFormattedPrice(productPrice - (countPromoInstalment(productPrice,instalmentNumber) * 1));
        installmentTab.append(promoBoxB1b.replace("XXX",boxPrice));
       } else if (gratisList1c.hasOwnProperty(plu) && (selectedPromo == "1gr" || selectedPromo == "default")) {
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        var instalmentNumber = 20,
            boxPrice = returnFormattedPrice(productPrice - (countPromoInstalment(productPrice,instalmentNumber) * 1));
        installmentTab.append(promoBoxB1c.replace("XXX",boxPrice));
       } else if ((selectedPromo == "raty04" && instalmentNumber == 60) || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 60)) {
         if(!$(".instalments-section").find(".rrso-link").length) {
           $(".instalments-section .info").append(rrso4);
         }
       } else if (selectedPromo == "male" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 36)) {
         if(!$(".instalments-section").find(".rrso-link").length) {
           $(".instalments-section .info").append(rrso1);
         }
       }  else if (selectedPromo == "male" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 50)) {
         if(!$(".instalments-section").find(".rrso-link").length) {
           $(".instalments-section .info").append(rrso1);
         }
       } else if (selectedPromo == "dobre" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 48)) {
         if(!$(".instalments-section").find(".rrso-link").length) {
           $(".instalments-section .info").append(rrso2);
         }
       } else if (selectedPromo == "raty04" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 36) || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 50)) {
         if(!$(".instalments-section").find(".rrso-link").length) {
           $(".instalments-section .info").append(rrso4);
         }
       } else if (selectedPromo == "raty03") {
         if(!$(".instalments-section").find(".rrso-link").length) {
           $(".instalments-section .info").append(rrso3);
         }
       }  
      else if (selectedPromo == "odroczone10" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 10)) {
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        installmentTab.append(promoBox1);
      } else if (selectedPromo == "odroczone20" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 20)) { 
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        installmentTab.append(promoBox2);
      } else if (selectedPromo == "odroczone30" || (selectedPromo == "default" && instalmentNumber == 30)) {
        installmentTab.addClass("promo-installment");
        installmentTab.append(promoBox3);
      } 
    } /*else if (!installmentTab.length > 0 && !$("#product-upselling").find(".delivery-unavailable").length > 0 && !$("#product-upselling").find(".promo-instalment-box").length > 0 && !installmentTab.prev(".price-tab").hasClass("price-outlet-tab") && pluFirst != "6" && productPrice < 300) {
    $(".product-detail-prices").after(promoBoxPayPo.replace("YYY",cat));
    }*/
  }
  
  function installmentCalculator() {
    $(".tab",".instalment-tabs").each(function() {
      var $that = $(this);
      var tabText = $that.text();
      var tab =  $(".instalment-option[data-instalment='"+$that.attr("data-instalment")+"']");
      var rpi =  $(".instalment-modal[data-remodal-id='instalment-"+$that.attr("data-instalment")+"']");
      var rpiParent = rpi.parent();
      var defaultReg = rpiParent.find(".promotion-regulation-file");
      var plu = $(".product-header").find(".productPlu:first").val() || $(".selenium-product-code")[0].childNodes[0].nodeValue.trim();
      if (sony.hasOwnProperty(plu) && tabText.indexOf("gratis") > 0) {
        var reg = '<a href="/si_upload/upload_regulaminy/05_2022/PrzedsprzedazSluchawekSONY.pdf" class="installment-promo-rules" target="_blank">Przedsprzedaż słuchawek SONY</a>';
        if (!rpiParent.find(".installment-promo-rules").length > 0) {
          if (defaultReg.length > 0) {
            defaultReg.after(reg)
            //defaultReg.hide()
          } else {
            rpiParent.find(".bank-name").after(reg);
          }
        }
      } 
    })
  }

  function insertElement() {
    var elements;
    if (getPageType() == "PRODUCT_LIST") {
      elements = $(".product-box","#products");
      promoPrices(elements);
    }
  }
  
  insertElement();
  collapseRules();
  
  $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
    if (settings.url.indexOf(location.pathname.split(",")[0]) !== -1) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        insertElement();
     },500)
    }
  });  
  $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
    if (settings.url.indexOf("selling-section") !== -1) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        installmentInfoOnCrossSell();
     },500)
    }
  });
  
  //$(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
  //  if (settings.url.indexOf("product-card-instalment") !== -1) {
  //    setTimeout(function() {
  //      installmentCalculator();
  //    },500)
  //  }
  //})

  
});
</script></div>

		<div data-id="64349535705-9" class="banner-item banner-html banner-text" >
			<style>
.product-header{position:relative}
.apple-enterprise-reseller {position: absolute;background-image: url(//f00.esfr.pl/si_upload/gfx/as.png);width: 100px;height: 30px;top: 0;right: 0;z-index: 1;background-size: contain;background-repeat: no-repeat}

<script>
  $(function() {
    
  var html = '<div class="apple-enterprise-reseller"></div>';
    
    function promoPrices(elem) {
      elem.each(function(v, o) {
        var $o = $(o),
            url = $o.find(".product-brand").attr("href"),
            header = $o.find(".product-header");
        if (url.indexOf("apple") > -1) {
          if (!$o.find(".apple-enterprise-reseller").length) {
            header.addClass("apple").prepend(html);
          }
        }
      })
    }
    
    function promoPricesNewKP() {
      var $o = $("#product-detail"),
          url = $o.find(".product-brand").attr("href"),
          header = $o.find(".product-header");
      if (url.indexOf("apple") > -1) {
        if (!$o.find(".apple-enterprise-reseller").length) {
          header.addClass("apple").prepend(html);
        }
      }
    }

    function insertElement() {
      var elements;
      if (app.pageType() == "leaf") {
        elements = $("#products").find(".product-box");
        promoPrices(elements);
      } else if (app.pageType() == "product-detail") {
        promoPricesNewKP();
      }
    }
    insertElement();

    $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
      if (settings.url.indexOf(location.pathname.split(",")[0]) !== -1) {
        insertElement();
      }
    });  
  })
</script></div>

<script>
  $(function() {
  
        	var dealsPlu = ["123"];
   

   
   
  var html = '<div class="deals-product-container-tv"><div class="deals-product-label-tv">PRODUKT Z REKLAMY TV</div></div>';
    
    function promoPrices(elem) {
      var promoMark;
      elem.each(function(v, o) {
        var $o = $(o),
            plu = $o.find("input.productPlu").val(),
            status = $o.find(".product-status"),
            header = $o.find(".product-header");
        if (dealsPlu.indexOf(plu) > -1) {
          $o.removeClass("product-top-list");
          status.css("display","none");
          if (!$o.find(".deals-product-container-tv").length) {
            header.after(html);
          }
        }
      })
    }

    function promoPricesNewKP() {
      var promoMark,
          $o = $("#product-top"),
          plu = _PRODUCT.plu,
          status = $o.find(".product-status"),
          header = $o.find(".product-header");
      if (dealsPlu.indexOf(plu) > -1) {
          $o.removeClass("product-top-list");
          status.css("display","none");
          if (!$o.find(".deals-product-container-tv").length) {
            header.after(html);
          }
        }
    }

    function insertElement() {
      var elements;
      if (app.pageType() == "leaf") {
        elements = $(".product-box","#products");
        promoPrices(elements);
      } else if (app.pageType() == "product-card") {
        elements = $("#product-card");
        promoPrices(elements);
      } else if (app.pageType() == "product-detail") {
        promoPricesNewKP();
      }
    }
    insertElement();

    $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
      if (settings.url.indexOf(location.pathname.split(",")[0]) !== -1) {
        insertElement();
      }
    });  
  })
</script></div>

":"","1237332":"","1248454":"","1261849":"","1262634":"","1261497":"","1261523":"","1237144":"","1261487":"","1261511":"","1261323":"","1265765":"","1261324":"","1228562":"","1234669":"","1160697":"","1262638":"","1263298":"","1261521":"","1261522":"","1237147":"","1261524":"","1262637":"","1161465":"","1226314":"","1235234":"","1235187":"","1226315":"","1226312":"","1235210":""}

    function getPageType() {
      var x = app.pageType();
      switch(x){
        case ("product-detail"):
        case ("product"):
          x = "PRODUCT_CARD";
          break;
        case ("leaf"):
          x = "PRODUCT_LIST";
          break;
        default:
          x = app.pageType();
      }
      return x;
    }


      var tvHTML = `<div class="dvbt-layer-container"><div class="dvbt-layer-title">Jak uzyskać dofinansowanie 250 zł na zakup telewizora?</div>
<ol class="dvbt-layer-counter">
<li class="dvbt-layer-text">Wygeneruj kod rabatowy na 250 zł. Jak wygenerować kod dowiesz się na stronie: <a href="https://www.gov.pl/web/dvbt2/juz-dzis-zloz-wniosek-o-dofinansowanie-do-zakupu-dekodera-lub-telewizora" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">https://www.gov.pl/web/dvbt2/juz-dzis-zloz-wniosek-o-dofinansowanie-do-zakupu-dekodera-lub-telewizora</a></li>
<li class="dvbt-layer-text">Zadzwoń na infolinię&nbsp; <a href="tel:+48855855899">855 855 899</a></li>
<li class="dvbt-layer-text">Podczas składania zamówienia podaj kod rabatowy naszemu konsultantowi</li></ol></div>`;
    
    var decHTML = `<div class="dvbt-layer-container"><div class="dvbt-layer-title">Jak uzyskać dofinansowanie 100 zł na zakup dekodera?</div>
<ol class="dvbt-layer-counter">
<li class="dvbt-layer-text">Wygeneruj kod rabatowy na 100 zł. Jak wygenerować kod dowiesz się na stronie: <a href="https://www.gov.pl/web/dvbt2/juz-dzis-zloz-wniosek-o-dofinansowanie-do-zakupu-dekodera-lub-telewizora" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">https://www.gov.pl/web/dvbt2/juz-dzis-zloz-wniosek-o-dofinansowanie-do-zakupu-dekodera-lub-telewizora</a></li>
<li class="dvbt-layer-text">Zadzwoń na infolinię&nbsp; <a href="tel:+48855855899">855 855 899</a></li>
<li class="dvbt-layer-text">Podczas składania zamówienia podaj kod rabatowy naszemu konsultantowi</li></ol></div>`;
    
  $(document).on("click", ".dvbt-tv, .change-dvbt-tv-number .call-and-order-button", function() {
    app.showModal({ id: "dvbt-info", modifier: "remodal-full-width", content: tvHTML });
  })

  $(document).on("click", ".dvbt-dec, .change-dvbt-dec-number .call-and-order-button", function() {
    app.showModal({ id: "dvbt-info", modifier: "remodal-full-width", content: decHTML });
  })

  function insertPhoneOnListing(elem) {
    elem.each(function(v, o) {
      var $o = $(o),
          category = $o.find(".product-category").text(),
          btnPrimary = $o.find(".add-to-cart-big"),
          plu = btnPrimary.attr("data-plu"),
          customPhone = $o.find(".call-button"),
          event = customPhone.attr("data-event");
      customPhone.hide(); 
      if(!$o.find(".pcc-big").length) {
        if ((category.indexOf("telewizor") > -1) && ((day > 0 && day < 6) && (hours > 8 && hours < 19)) && (!tvPlu.hasOwnProperty(plu))) {
          btnPrimary.after(dvbtNumber.replace("XXX",event));
          $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 899").next("p").text("pon.-pt. 9:00 - 19:00");
          $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
        } else if ((category.indexOf("dekoder DVB-T") > -1) && ((day > 0 && day < 6) && (hours > 8 && hours < 19))) {
          btnPrimary.after(dvbtDecNumber.replace("XXX",event));
          $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 899").next("p").text("pon.-pt. 9:00 - 19:00");
          $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
        } else if (category.indexOf("laptop") > -1 || category.indexOf("ultrabook") > -1 || category.indexOf("tablet multimedialny") > -1 || category.indexOf("tablet iPad") > -1 || category.indexOf("tablet iPad mini") > -1 || category.indexOf("smartfon") > -1 || category.indexOf("Smartwatch") > -1 || category.indexOf("zegarek sportowy") > -1) {
          btnPrimary.after(customNumber.replace("XXX",event));
          $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 899");
          $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
          $(".call-order-phone.wybierz").text("855 855 899").next("p").text("Następnie wybierz 2");
        } else if (category.indexOf("konsola PS5") > -1 && ((day > 0 && day < 6) && (hours > 8 && hours < 19))) {
          btnPrimary.after(psNumber.replace("XXX",event));
          $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 888");
          $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
        } else {
          btnPrimary.after(number.replace("XXX",event));
        }
      }
    })
  }  


  function insertPhoneOnKP(elem) {
    elem.each(function(v, o) {
      var $o = $(o),
          category = $(".product-category").text(),
          plu = _PRODUCT.plu;
      if(!$o.hasClass("change-kp-number")) {
        if (category.indexOf("laptop") > -1 || category.indexOf("ultrabook") > -1 || category.indexOf("tablet multimedialny") > -1 || category.indexOf("tablet iPad") > -1 || category.indexOf("tablet iPad mini") > -1 || category.indexOf("smartfon") > -1 || category.indexOf("Smartwatch") > -1 || category.indexOf("zegarek sportowy") > -1) {
          $o.addClass("change-kp-number")
          $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 899");
          $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
        }
      }
      if(!$o.hasClass("change-dvbt-tv-number")) {
        if (category.indexOf("telewizor") > -1 && !tvPlu.hasOwnProperty(plu)) {
          if ((day > 0 && day < 6) && (hours > 8 && hours < 19)) {
            $o.addClass("change-dvbt-tv-number")
            $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 899").next("p").text("pon.-pt. 9:00 - 19:00");
            $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
          }
        }
      }
      if(!$o.hasClass("change-dvbt-dec-number")) {
        if (category.indexOf("dekoder DVB-T") > -1) {
          if ((day > 0 && day < 6) && (hours > 8 && hours < 19)) {
            $o.addClass("change-dvbt-dec-number")
            $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 899").next("p").text("pon.-pt. 9:00 - 19:00");
            $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
          }
        }
      }
      if(!$o.hasClass("change-ps-number")) {
        if (category.indexOf("konsola PS5") > -1 && ((day > 0 && day < 6) && (hours > 8 && hours < 19))) {
          $o.addClass("change-ps-number");
          $(".call-order-phone").text("855 855 888");
          $(".custom-helpline-hours-msg").hide();
        }
      }
    })
  }

  function insertElement() {
    var elements;
    if (getPageType() == "PRODUCT_LIST") {
      elements = $(".product-box","#products");
      insertPhoneOnListing(elements);
    } else if ((getPageType() == "PRODUCT_CARD")) {
      elements = $("#product-top");
      insertPhoneOnKP(elements);
    }
  }

  if(seleniumUser == false){
    insertElement();
  }

  if(seleniumUser == false){
    $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
      if (settings.url.indexOf(location.pathname.split(",")[0]) !== -1) {
        insertElement();
      }
    }); 
    $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
      if (settings.url.indexOf("selling-section") !== -1) {
        setTimeout(function() {
          insertElement();
        },500)
      }
    }); 
  }
  
});
</script></div>
	</div>
<!-- end area: footer -->

   #new-footer.sections .section.section-services .service-element .links a{margin-bottom:10px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-services .service-element .links a.abe_arrow:after {font-size: 11px;margin-left: 5px;content: "\E00A";font-family: iconFont!important;speak: none;display: inline-block;font-display: block;font-style: normal;font-weight: 400;font-variant: normal;text-transform: none;line-height: 1;vertical-align: middle;color: inherit;}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-services .service-element h3{font-size:16px;margin-left:10px;line-height:21px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-nav-links{display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-ms-flex-pack:justify;justify-content:space-between;font-size:14px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-nav-links > *{-ms-flex-positive:1;flex-grow:1;-ms-flex-preferred-size:0;flex-basis:0;margin-left:20px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-nav-links > :first-child{margin-left:0}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-nav-links h3{font-size:22px;margin-bottom:20px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-nav-links li{margin-bottom:10px}
     
   #new-footer.sections .section .links a{color:#005CA9;font-size: 12px;text-transform:uppercase;display:inline-block;}
   #new-footer.sections .section .links a span{padding-left: 5px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-logo-brands {margin-bottom: 45px;text-align: center;border-top: 2px solid #e1e1e1;padding-top: 20px}
   
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-logo-brands {text-align: center;padding: 12px 0 8px}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-logo-brands img {display: inline-block;vertical-align: middle;padding-right: 20px;width: auto;}
   #new-footer.sections .section.section-logo-brands img:last-child{padding-right: 0}
     
     
   #new-footer.sections #footer-owner,
   #new-footer.sections #footer-owner-address {text-align: center;font-size: 12px;color: #999;min-height: 17px}
   
   
   @media (max-width: 1230px) {  
     #new-footer.sections .section {padding: 0 20px}
     #new-footer.sections .section.section-social .links a{margin-right:10px;}
     #main-footer p{width:auto;}
     #new-footer.sections .section {max-width: 1000px}
     #new-footer.sections .section.section-bar > *{padding-right:50px}

   #footer-icons img{height: 24px;display: block;margin: auto;width:auto}
   #footer-icons>*{margin-right:35px;line-height: 24px;text-align: center}

   <style>
   #footer-menu{display:table;width:100%;table-layout:fixed}
   #footer-menu div,#footer-menu div+div{display:table-cell;padding:0;padding-right:82px;color:#666}
   #footer-menu div a{display:block;float:none;padding:0;margin:8px 0 0;font-size:11px}
   #footer-menu div .btn.btn-footer{padding:8px 0 9px;font-size:11px;margin:12px 0 13px;color:#fff}

   <style>
   .js-go-to-contact-page,
   .js-go-to-find-shop {cursor: pointer;}
   #main-footer [data-href]:hover,
   #main-footer [data-href]:hover .footer-heading,
   .js-go-to-find-shop:hover p {color: #005CA9!important;}
   </style>
 <script>
     $('#main-footer div[data-href]').on('click', function (e) {
         var href = $(this).data('href');
         if (e.target.tagName == "A" || !href) return;
         document.location = href;
     });
     
 
       $('#main-footer #new-footer').on('click', 'a', function(){
         var thisHref = $(this).attr('href');
         if($(this).hasClass('scl-link')){
             UA.interaction('Social', 'Footer', $(this).text());
         }else if(this.innerText.trim() == 'DOWIEDZ SIĘ WIĘCEJ'){
           UA.interaction("Test SG","Sekcja Footer - klikniecie",$(this).text().trim() +" | "+ thisHref.substring(0, thisHref.indexOf('?')).escapeDiacritics());
         }else if ($(this).find('img:only-child').length > 0){
             UA.interaction("Test SG","Sekcja Footer - klikniecie", "IMG | "+ thisHref.substring(0, thisHref.indexOf('?')).escapeDiacritics());
         }else if (this.innerText.trim().indexOf("@euro.com.pl")>0){
             UA.interaction("Test SG","Sekcja Footer - klikniecie","Adres email");
         }else if ($(this).hasClass('call')){
             UA.interaction("Test SG","Sekcja Footer - klikniecie","Numer telefonu");
         }else{
             UA.interaction("Test SG","Sekcja Footer - klikniecie",$(this).text().trim().escapeDiacritics());
         }
       });
 
   
 </script><!-- stopka_bloczki -->

 .app-desktop .warranty-item .warranty-description {padding: 30px 30px 10px;font-size: 14px}
</style>
<style>#promo .scale-a_g_v2{display:none !important}</style>
<style>
#author-page .proposed-authors-photo {height: 340px;}

<script>
  $(function() {

    function CCandOutlet() {
      $(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, xhr, settings) {
        if (settings.url.indexOf("shops-refresh-element.ltr") !== -1) {
          setTimeout(function() {
            $(".shop-item").each(function() {
              var $o = $(this),
                  name = $o.find("h3"),
                  nameText = name.text().trim();
              if (nameText == "Outbound PCC") {
                $o.hide()
              } else if (nameText == "Factory Annopol – sklep outletowy") {
                $o.addClass("outlet").prependTo("#shops-area");
                $("#shops-area").addClass("outlet")
                if (!$(".shop-list-title","#shops-area").length > 0) {
                  $("#shops-area").prepend('<div class="shop-list-title">Sklep outletowy <span class="red">Produkty w wyjątkowo niskich cenach</span></div>');
                  $(".shop-item.outlet").after('<div class="shop-list-title bottom">Pozostałe sklepy</div>')
                }
              }
            })
          },300);
        }
      })
    }

    function init() {
      if(window.location.pathname != "/sklepy.bhtml") {
        return false
      } else {
        CCandOutlet();
      }
    }
    init()

  })
</script>

</div>

<script>
  function oneTrustAnalytic(){
    var isUpdate=false;
    
    function checkIsUpdateOpen(){
        if(document.cookie.indexOf('OptanonAlertBoxClosed')>-1){
            isUpdate = true
        }
    }
    
    function bindEvents(){
        checkIsUpdateOpen()
               
        // 1. zaakceptuj
        $('body').on('click', '#onetrust-accept-btn-handler', function(){
          zaakceptujGlownyButton()
          checkIsUpdateOpen();
        })
      
        // 2. zaakceptuj wszystkie
        $('body').on('click', '#accept-recommended-btn-handler', function(){
          zaakceptujWszystkie()
          checkIsUpdateOpen();
        })
        
        // 3. zaakceptuj ustawienia i zamknij
        $('body').on('click', '.save-preference-btn-handler', function(){
           zapisUstawieniaIzamknij()
           checkIsUpdateOpen()
        })
    }
    
    function zaakceptujGlownyButton(){
          app.logEvent({
          "id": "onetrust_cookie_consent",
          "f03": window.location.href,
          "f04": "Analityczne: true",
          "f05": "Funkcjonalne: true",
          "f06": "Reklamowe: true",
          "f07": "Glowny_zaakceptuj"
        });
    }
    
    function zaakceptujWszystkie(){
        app.logEvent({
          "id": "onetrust_cookie_consent",
          "f03": window.location.href,
          "f04": "Analityczne: "+ $('input#ot-group-id-C0002').is(':checked'),
          "f05": "Funkcjonalne: "+ $('input#ot-group-id-C0003').is(':checked'),
          "f06": "Reklamowe: "+ $('input#ot-group-id-C0004').is(':checked'),
          "f07": isUpdate ? "Aktualizacja_zaakceptuj_wszystkie" : "Glowny_zaakceptuj_wszystkie"
      });
    }
    
    function zapisUstawieniaIzamknij(){
        app.logEvent({
          "id": "onetrust_cookie_consent",
          "f03": window.location.href,
          "f04": "Analityczne: "+ $('input#ot-group-id-C0002').is(':checked'),
          "f05": "Funkcjonalne: "+ $('input#ot-group-id-C0003').is(':checked'),
          "f06": "Reklamowe: "+ $('input#ot-group-id-C0004').is(':checked'),
          "f07": isUpdate ? "Aktualizacja_zapisz_ustawienia_i_zamknij" : "Glowny_zapisz_ustawienia_i_zamknij"
      });
    }
    
    function init(){
        bindEvents();
    }
    
    init()
}

function oneTrustPopupDisplayAnalytics(){
    var whichTime;
    
    function wyswietlenie(){
      app.logEvent({
        "id": "onetrust_cookie_consent",
        "f03": window.location.href,
        "f04": "Popup",
        "f05": whichTime,
        "f06": " ",
        "f07": " "
      });
    }
  
    function bindClick(){
        $('#ot-sdk-btn').click(function(){
          $(this).addClass('-open')
           wyswietlenie()
           
        })
    }

    function observerSwich(){
      if(document.cookie.indexOf('OptanonAlertBoxClosed')<=-1){
        whichTime = 'Pierwsze wyswietlenie'
        wyswietlenie()
      }
      else{
        whichTime = 'Kolejne wyswietlenie'
        bindClick()
      }
    } 
  
  function init(){
    observerSwich()
  }
  
  init()
}

function showOneTrustFooterButton(){
  if($('.section-nav-links').find('#ot-sdk-btn').length>0){
    $('#ot-sdk-btn').addClass('-active')
  }
}  
  
//callback oneTrust
function OptanonWrapper() {
	setTimeout(function(){
      	$('#ot-sdk-btn').off('click')
      	showOneTrustFooterButton()
        oneTrustPopupDisplayAnalytics()
        $('#cookie-bar.-active').removeClass('-active')
	},500)
}
</script>
<!-- kod dyn rmkt adwords przeniesiony do GTM -->

<script type="text/javascript">
  function chatOnSG() {
    (function(d, s, id, cb) {
      var js = d.createElement(s);
      var n = d.createElement("div");
      n.id = id;
      if (js.readyState) {js.onreadystatechange = function() {if (js.readyState === "loaded" || js.readyState === "complete") {js.onreadystatechange = null; cb();}};} else {js.onload = function(){cb();};}
      js.src = "https://live-chat.chatbotize.com/chatbotize-entrypoint.min.js";
      document.body.appendChild(js);
      document.body.appendChild(n);
    })(document, "script", "chatbotize", function() {
      Chatbotize.init({
        instanceId: "fb64e04d80d141adb1c062f1ed177662",
        startOnOpen: true,
        headerMode: "white",
        metadata: {
          extraParams: {
            "pageType": "main-page",
          },
        },
        startOnOpen: true,
        onLoaded: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_loaded')
        },
        onOpen: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_opened');
          sessionStorage.setItem("zowie", "sg");
        },
        onClose: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_closed')
        },
        onStart: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_conversation_started')
        },
        onShow: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_showed');
        },
        onMessageSent: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_message_sent')
        },
        onChatReacted: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_conversation_reacted')
        },
        onMessageReceived: function(text) {
          if(text !== undefined && text.indexOf("naszego zespołu") !== -1) {
            UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_handover')
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  function chatOnListing() {
    (function(d, s, id, cb) {
      var js = d.createElement(s);
      var n = d.createElement("div");
      n.id = id;
      if (js.readyState) {js.onreadystatechange = function() {if (js.readyState === "loaded" || js.readyState === "complete") {js.onreadystatechange = null; cb();}};} else {js.onload = function(){cb();};}
      js.src = "https://live-chat.chatbotize.com/chatbotize-entrypoint.min.js";
      document.body.appendChild(js);
      document.body.appendChild(n);
    })(document, "script", "chatbotize", function() {
      Chatbotize.init({
        instanceId: "fb64e04d80d141adb1c062f1ed177662",
        startOnOpen: true,
        headerMode: "white",
        metadata: {
          extraParams: {
            "pageType": "leaf",
            "pageTitle": $("#products-header h1").text().trim().toLowerCase()
          },
        },
        startOnOpen: true,
        onLoaded: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_loaded')
        },
        onOpen: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_opened');
          sessionStorage.setItem("zowie", "listing");
        },
        onClose: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_closed')
        },
        onStart: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_conversation_started')
        },
        onShow: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_showed');
        },
        onMessageSent: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_message_sent')
        },
        onChatReacted: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_conversation_reacted')
        },
        onMessageReceived: function(text) {
          if(text !== undefined && text.indexOf("naszego zespołu") !== -1) {
            UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_handover')
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  function chatOnKp() {
    (function(d, s, id, cb) {
      var js = d.createElement(s);
      var n = d.createElement("div");
      n.id = id;
      if (js.readyState) {js.onreadystatechange = function() {if (js.readyState === "loaded" || js.readyState === "complete") {js.onreadystatechange = null; cb();}};} else {js.onload = function(){cb();};}
      js.src = "https://live-chat.chatbotize.com/chatbotize-entrypoint.min.js";
      document.body.appendChild(js);
      document.body.appendChild(n);
    })(document, "script", "chatbotize", function() {
      Chatbotize.init({
        instanceId: "fb64e04d80d141adb1c062f1ed177662",
        startOnOpen: true,
        headerMode: "white",
        metadata: {
          extraParams: {
            "pageType": "product",
          },
        },
        startOnOpen: true,
        onLoaded: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'kp_loaded')
        },
        onOpen: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'kp_opened');
          sessionStorage.setItem("zowie", "kp");

          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'kp_closed')

      });
    });
  }

  function chatEverywhereElse() {
    (function(d, s, id, cb) {
      var js = d.createElement(s);
      var n = d.createElement("div");
      n.id = id;
      if (js.readyState) {js.onreadystatechange = function() {if (js.readyState === "loaded" || js.readyState === "complete") {js.onreadystatechange = null; cb();}};} else {js.onload = function(){cb();};}
      js.src = "https://live-chat.chatbotize.com/chatbotize-entrypoint.min.js";
      document.body.appendChild(js);
      document.body.appendChild(n);
    })(document, "script", "chatbotize", function() {
      Chatbotize.init({
        instanceId: "fb64e04d80d141adb1c062f1ed177662",
        startOnOpen: true,
        headerMode: "white",
        metadata: {
          extraParams: {
            "pageType": "faq",
          },
        },
        startOnOpen: true,
        onLoaded: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'loaded')
        },
        onOpen: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'opened');
          sessionStorage.setItem("zowie", "faq");
        },
        onClose: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'closed')
        },
        onStart: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'conversation_started')
        },
        onShow: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'showed')
        },
        onMessageSent: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'message_sent')
        },
        onChatReacted: function() {
          UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'conversation_reacted')
        },
        onMessageReceived: function(text) {
          if(text !== undefined && text.indexOf("naszego zespołu") !== -1) {
            UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'handover')
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  function runZowieWidget(page) {
    var num = Math.floor(Math.random() * 101);
    if (num >= 20) {
      if (page == "main-page") {
        chatOnSG() 
      } else if (page == "leaf") {
        chatOnListing() 
      } else if (page == "product-detail") {
        chatOnKp() 
      } else if (page == "faq") {
        chatEverywhereElse() 
      } 
    }
  }

  var faqPages = {
    "/cms/kontakt.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/pomoc-informacje.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/raty.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/raty-najczesciej-zadawane-pytania.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/raty-przez-internet-pod-ochrona.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/wygodna-dostawa.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/pomoc-dostawa.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/pomoc-reklamacja-towaru.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/pomoc-jakie-sposoby-platnosci-sa-akceptowane.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/sprzedaz-dla-firm-i-instytucji.bhtml":"",
    "/cms/sprzedaz-dla-firm-i-instytucji2.bhtml":""
  };
  
  var lsPages = {
    "/komputery-stacjonarne-pc.bhtml":"",
    "/komputery-all-in-one.bhtml":"",
    "/klimatyzatory-przenosne.bhtml":"",
    "/sluchawki.bhtml":"",
    "/wentylatory-i-klimatory.bhtml":"",
    "/pojazdy-elektryczne.bhtml":"",
    "/drony.bhtml":"",

    "/inne.bhtml":"",
    "/myszy.bhtml":"",

    "/depilatory-ipl.bhtml":"",
    "/depilatory.bhtml":"",
    "/lokowki.bhtml":"",
    "/lokowko-suszarki.bhtml":"",
    "/szczoteczki-elektryczne.bhtml":""
  };
  
  function getParameterFromUrl(name, url) {
      if (!url) url = location.href;
      name = name.replace(/[\[]/,"\\\[").replace(/[\]]/,"\\\]");
      var regexS = "[\\?&]"+name+"=([^&#]*)",
          regex = new RegExp( regexS ),
          results = regex.exec( url );
      return results == null ? null : results[1];
    }

  if(atrUser == false) {
    var zowieVersion = getParameterFromUrl("zowie");
    if (zowieVersion && zowieVersion == "ok") {
      chatEverywhereElse()
    //} else if (sessionStorage.getItem("zowie") == "sg") {    
      //chatOnSG()
    } else if (sessionStorage.getItem("zowie") == "listing") {    
      chatOnListing()
    //} else if (sessionStorage.getItem("zowie") == "kp") {    
      //chatOnKp()
    } else if (sessionStorage.getItem("zowie") == "faq") {    
      chatEverywhereElse()
    //} else if (app.pageType() == "main-page") {
      //UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'sg_page_loaded');
      //runZowieWidget("main-page");
    } else if (lsPages.hasOwnProperty(window.location.pathname)) {
      UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'ls_page_loaded');
      chatOnListing()
    //} else if (app.pageType() == "product-detail") {
      //UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'kp_page_loaded');
      //runZowieWidget("product-detail");
    } else if (faqPages.hasOwnProperty(window.location.pathname)) {
      UA.interaction('event', 'Zowie', 'page_loaded');
      runZowieWidget("faq");
    }
  }
